00024 #import <UIKit/UIKit.h>
00025 
00026 #import "BCVideo.h"
00027 #import "BCPlayerDelegate.h"
00028 
00069 @interface BCPlayer : NSObject
00070 {       
00071         // The delegate to this player is implemented in user app code
00072         id <BCPlayerDelegate> delegate; 
00073         
00074         // This class is a facade for the following embedded BCMoviePlayerController 
00075         NSObject *videoPlayer;
00076 
00077         // The video objects which this player can play at any one time
00078         BCVideo *bcVideo;
00079         BCVideo *relatedVideo;
00080                 
00081         // The player modifies the device UI and restores it 
00082         // to the app's settings using these variables
00083         UIInterfaceOrientation appOrientation;
00084         BOOL appStatusBarHidden;
00085         
00086         // This view is used to hide visual transforms which execute 
00087         // at varying speeds on different devices
00088         UIImageView *blackScreen;
00089         
00090         // Instance variables and properties used to control content
00091         NSURL *contentURL;
00092         NSTimeInterval contentLength;   
00093         BOOL shareMenuEnabled;
00094         BOOL moreVideosMenuEnabled;
00095         BOOL showRelatedMoviesOnComplete;
00096         BOOL useCoverflow;
00097         double playerId;
00098         NSArray *relatedVideos;
00099         NSArray *popularVideos;
00100     int renditionLowBitRate;
00101     int renditionHighBitRate;  
00102 }
00103 
00104 
00110 @property (nonatomic, readonly) BCVideo *bcVideo;
00111 
00117 @property (nonatomic, assign) id <BCPlayerDelegate> delegate;
00118 
00125 @property (nonatomic, assign) BOOL shareMenuEnabled;
00126 
00134 @property (nonatomic, assign) BOOL moreVideosMenuEnabled;
00135 
00142 @property (nonatomic, assign) BOOL showRelatedMoviesOnComplete;
00143 
00151 @property (nonatomic, assign) double playerId;
00152 
00159 @property (nonatomic, retain) NSArray *relatedVideos;
00160 
00167 @property (nonatomic, retain) NSArray *popularVideos;
00168 
00178 @property (nonatomic, assign) BOOL useCoverflow;
00179 
00185 - (void) play:(BCVideo *) video;
00186 
00192 - (void) stop;
00193 
00200 - (void) searchForRenditionsBetweenLowBitRate:(int) lowBitRate andHighBitRate:(int) highBitRate;
00201 
00202 @end
